name: cboroson-ManageAppServices
description: Stop, start or verify all app services in a resource group.
author: Craig Boroson

inputs.name: ConnectedServiceName
inputs.label: AzureRM Subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the Azure Resource Manager subscription.

inputs.name: resourceGroupName
inputs.label: Resource Group
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter or Select the Azure Resource Group that contains the App Services to manage.

inputs.name: Action
inputs.label: Action
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is the secret value associated with a service integration in your PagerDuty subscription.

inputs.name: MinutesToWait
inputs.label: Minutes to wait
inputs.helpMarkDown: Length of time in minutes for service action to complete.

inputs.name: IncludeWebjobs
inputs.label: Include webjobs
inputs.helpMarkDown: Choosing this option will perform the requested action on all continuous webjobs in the resource group.

inputs.name: FailTask
inputs.label: Fail task if services do not respond to the requested action
inputs.helpMarkDown: If the selected action is 'Stop' or 'Start' and the services do not respond to the action, the task will fail.  When this option is not selected, the task will not check the status of the services after performing the action.

inputs.name: ExcludeSites
inputs.label: Exclude Sites
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional regular expression to exclude sites matching this regex value.
